name: @pokornyd/kontent-ai-rich-text-parser
description: TypeScript transformer of Kontent.ai rich text content into Portable text.

scripts.publish:patch: npx rimraf dist && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npx rimraf dist && npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npx rimraf dist && npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:esnext
